name: Agapeland Summer Program
description: Agapeland is a comprehensive six-week program for K-8th graders. Students will thrive in group activities and fun outings as they learn about cultural appreciation, environmental care, fitness, and more.
fullDescription: Agapeland is a comprehensive six-week program for K-8th graders. Students will thrive in group activities and fun outings as they learn about cultural appreciation, environmental care, fitness, and more.
whatTheyOffer: Agapeland is a comprehensive six-week program for K-8th graders. Students will thrive in group activities and fun outings as they learn about cultural appreciation, environmental care, fitness, and more.
howToGetIt: Online Registration Form New applicants will be contacted to schedule a brief interview. Payment method: By check only. Please make check payable to “ACC” Tuition payments are non-refundable and non-transferable. Please send check and printed application to: Agapeland Summer Program, 378 18th Ave. San Francisco, CA 94121
cost: This is a Fee-Based service with each session costing $850/child
